docs.lead_paragraph: It's nice to be back home, nice to start a new year. I have a brief statement to make before I answer questions.

docs.lead_paragraph: RIGHT NOW as you are reading this, some 30 million Americans are sneezing, coughing, blowing, shivering or otherwise enduring the miseries of man's most common illness, the cold.
